channel.title: CVE Feed for Nexx -- Smart Alarm NXAL-100
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Nexx -- Smart Alarm NXAL-100

item.title: CVE-2023-1749|2023-04-04T16:54:46.115Z -- nexx -- smart%20alarm%20nxal-100
item.description: The listed versions of Nexx Smart Home devices lack proper access control when executing actions. An attacker with a valid NexxHome deviceId could send API requests that the affected devices would execute.
